select new Module(t.id, t.moduleAddr, t.isVisible, t.isPublic, t.target, t.moduleCode, t.moduleName, t.iconAddr,t.hasChild) from Module t Where t.delFlag = :delFlag
#if($isVisible) AND t.isVisible = :isVisible #end
#if($parentModuleId && $parentModuleId.length() > 0) AND t.parentModuleId = :parentModuleId #else AND t.parentModuleId is null #end
#if($moduleCode && $moduleCode.length() > 0) AND t.moduleCode = :moduleCode #end
#if($moduleName && $moduleName.length() > 0) AND t.moduleName like concat('%', :moduleName, '%') #end
#if($role && $role.id.length() > 0) AND :role in elements(t.roleList) #end
#if($isPublic) AND t.isPublic = :isPublic #end
order by t.sortSq asc

#if($isVisible) AND t.isVisible = :isVisible #end
#if($parentModuleId && $parentModuleId.length() > 0) AND t.parentModuleId = :parentModuleId #else AND t.parentModuleId is null #end

#if($role && $role.id.length() > 0) AND :role in elements(t.roleList) #end
#if($isPublic) AND t.isPublic = :isPublic #end

select distinct t from Module t left join t.roleList r Where t.delFlag = :delFlag
#if($isVisible) AND t.isVisible = :isVisible #end
#if($parentModuleId && $parentModuleId.length() > 0) AND t.parentModuleId = :parentModuleId #else AND t.parentModuleId is null #end
#if($moduleCode && $moduleCode.length() > 0) AND t.moduleCode = :moduleCode #end
#if($moduleName && $moduleName.length() > 0) AND t.moduleName like concat('%', :moduleName, '%') #end
#if($roleList) AND (r.id in (:roleList) or t.isPublic = 1) #end
#if(!$roleList) AND t.isPublic = 1 #end
order by t.sortSq asc
